apps.author: Toblo
apps.name: Life Log
apps.description: Log and track your psychological health data. By entering your stress and anxiety levels over time, learn when you’re most productive or vulnerable, and whether your levels of stress are healthy or unhealthy.

policy.positive: Your data is not shared with any other parties unless you permit access to the data.
policy.negative: This app may share your data with developers, third parties (advertisers), academic institutions, and friends of your friends on the app .

reviews: Nice to be able to see my mood patterns and understand what triggers my anxiety

apps.author: Carrie Dev
apps.name: Calm
apps.description: Guided deep breathing, meditation, and positive thinking exercises help you cope with stress.

policy.positive: Your data is not shared with any other parties unless you permit access to the data.
policy.negative: This app may share your data with developers, third parties (advertisers), academic institutions, and friends of your friends on the app .

reviews: Helped a little to control my anxiety.
The deep breathing exercise is so so. Wish I could save progress.

apps.author: PixieBirds
apps.name: Bumble
apps.description: Your biggest social media feeds, all in one hive. See what your friends are buzzing about on each network!

policy.positive: Your data is not shared with any other parties unless you permit access to the data.
policy.negative: This app may share your data with developers, third parties (advertisers), academic institutions, and friends of your friends on the app .

reviews: I like I can check different app updates at the same time, but a little confusing to use
Nice to not have to switch between apps but it’s not that much different from  just checking my notifications screen.

apps.author: Lyara
apps.name: Lync
apps.description: Met someone great recently, but you missed the chance to connect? Use Lync’s GPS feature to find the one that got away!

policy.positive: Your data is not shared with any other parties unless you permit access to the data.
policy.negative: This app may share your data with developers, third parties (advertisers), academic institutions, and friends of your friends on the app .

reviews: It makes it easier to friend people on different apps.
OK way to add new people.
